title: How to keep yourself updated on design - Quora

response.answer_text: Simple Stay updated!! Here is how : As technology is getting better day by day so do the design trends, but as everything changes so quickly it becomes difficult to keep ourselves up-to-date with new design trends in market. You can use google for everything, so keep your eyes open to the latest design changes and innovations. Just follow these steps and you will be full way there as a good designer: Never stop Learning : On daily basis new technologies are introduced, so keep learning and read as many as books. There are good chrome extensions like Muzli and Panda that will help you a lot. Similarly there is a website called Sidebar.io for daily design articles. Join Online groups, discuss and take feedback on your design Check websites for innovations : There is this website called awwwards.com, it aims to promote best the best innovative web designs. Catch daily designs uploaded by various designers around the world on Dribble and Behance. Hope this helps!

Keeping up with the latest design trend is as simple as drawing inspiration from common sites you visit. I used a very robust style for my graphic and web designs when iOS 6 was around. Then iOS 7 went flat. I liked it and changed my designs from detailed and 3-d to a flatter and sharper design. My sites were never mobile responsive until I began to use my iPod a lot more. To actually learn these skills is a harder task, but with online research and tinkering around, you can keep updated with design quite easily.
